=== Roadmap for Raring Ringtail ===
This page is to serve as a development roadmap for the next version of Xubuntu.

<nowiki>[[http://status.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-raring/group/topic-raring-flavor-xubuntu.html|Click here to see the current status of development.]]</nowiki>
